pkgmetadata.longdescription: This package contains a DAB and DAB+ encoder that integrates into the ODR-mmbTools. The DAB encoder is based on toolame. The DAB+ encoder uses a modified library of the Fraunhofer FDK AAC code from Android, patched for 960-transform to do DAB+ broadcast encoding.

use.flag: Allows the encoder to use all inputs supported by VLC, and therefore also webstreams and other network sources.
